hooks.command: if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "msys" || "$OSTYPE" == "cygwin" || -n "$WSL_DISTRO_NAME" ]]; then powershell.exe -c "(New-Object Media.SoundPlayer '$(wslpath -w .claude/hooksounds/task_complete.wav)').PlaySync()"; else aplay .claude/hooksounds/task_complete.wav 2>/dev/null || afplay .claude/hooksounds/task_complete.wav 2>/dev/null || printf '\a'; fi

if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "msys" || "$OSTYPE" == "cygwin" || -n "$WSL_DISTRO_NAME" ]]; then powershell.exe -c "(New-Object Media.SoundPlayer '$(wslpath -w .claude/hooksounds/task_waiting.wav)').PlaySync()"; else aplay .claude/hooksounds/task_waiting.wav 2>/dev/null || afplay .claude/hooksounds/task_waiting.wav 2>/dev/null || printf '\a'; fi
